title: Revenue of water utilities - United States 2000 to 2015
summary: The graph presents data on the water utilities United States sales Revenue worldwide from 2000 to 2015 .
The source estimates that the United States VR States market size in 2005 will be worth 35.1 billion U.S. dollars .
This number is expected to grow 53.8 billion by the end of 2015 .
gold: This statistic represents the revenue of the water utility industry in the United States between 2000 and 2015 . In 2015 , this particular industry generated revenue of approximately 53.8 billion U.S. dollars .
